item.title: Stocks Portfolio Analysis
item.author: simumbaaaron20@gmail.com (Aaron Simumba)
item.description: library(quantmod) library(ggplot2) library(xts) library(highcharter) library(PerformanceAnalytics) library(dygraphs) ## Dates have been loaded as a factor instead of as dates. #There is need to convert this variable to the date class and covert the rest of the variables to xts(Extensible Time Series) temp <- xts(x =fundreturn[,-1], order.by = as.
